name: toziuha2.zip
items: Toziuha Night - Order of the Alchemists.sh

attr.title: Toziuha Night - Order of the Alchemists
attr.desc: This is the story of Xandria, an iron alchemist. She seeks revenge regardless of the consequences. To achieve it, Xandria fights with a powerful whip and the power of chemical elements. Find out more about her in this modern metroidvania adventure
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Itch.io, gog or steam, download and extract the tn_oota.pck into the gamedata folder. You can also use the demo from Itch.io. This game requires a device with 2GB RAM.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Itch.io](https://dannygaray60.itch.io/toziuha-night-order-of-the-alchemists), [GOG](https://www.gog.com/en/game/toziuha_night_order_of_the_alchemists) or [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2112750/Toziuha_Night_Order_of_the_Alchemists/), download and extract the `tn_oota.pck` into the `gamedata` folder. You can also use the demo from `Itch.io`. This game requires a device with 2GB RAM.
